Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 22nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 1965...
Earned first career win on 6/23/1966...
Had first career hit on 6/16/1967, off Bill f Henry (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1968, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1968, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1970, going 4-1, 1.73...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/1971 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/19/1972, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1972, going 6-0, 0.74...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/6/1973, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
